excerpt: This vegan chickpea curry is a delicious and healthy meal that's quick and easy to make.
instructions: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat.
Saut√© onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry powder and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in chickpeas, tomatoes, coconut milk, salt, and pepper.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes until the curry thickens.
Serve over rice or with naan bread.
